Uses of Interface
com.esri.mo2.map.draw.LegendInfo

Packages that use LegendInfo
com.esri.mo2.map.draw Classes used for rendering vector data. 
 

Uses of LegendInfo in com.esri.mo2.map.draw
 

Subinterfaces of LegendInfo in com.esri.mo2.map.draw
 interface GroupRenderer
          Draws a FeatureClass using a list of renderers.
 interface Renderer
          Responsible for drawing the Features from a FeatureLayer.
 interface ScaleDependentRenderer
          A ScaleDependentRenderer is a wrapper for another Renderer.
 interface SimpleRenderer
          A Simple Renderer is used to draw one type of Feature (Point, Line or Polygon) using a symbol.
 interface ValueMapRenderer
          A Valuemap renderer provides support for rendering based upon the value of an attribute - defined by one of the associated FeatureLayer's Fields.
 

Classes in com.esri.mo2.map.draw that implement LegendInfo
 class BaseClassBreaksRenderer
          A ClassBreak renderer is used to draw one type of feature broken up into different breaks.
 class BaseGroupRenderer
          This class uses a java.util.ArrayList for the underlying collection of sub-Renderers.
 class BaseRenderer
          This class can be used as a base class for your own Renderer.
 class BaseScaleDependentRenderer
          This is basic implementation of ScaleDependentRenderer interface.
 class BaseSimpleLabelRenderer
          This is an implementation of LabelRenderer that supports just one TextSymbol, in the same way that BaseSimpleRenderer does.
 class BaseSimpleRenderer
          This is a basic implementation of SimpleRenderer interface.
 class BaseUniqueValueRenderer
          This helper class provides a simple way to add LegendClasses based on single (unique) values instead of value Ranges.
 class BaseValueMapLabelRenderer
          An implementation of LabelRenderer that supports a ValueMap of TextSymbols, in the same way that BaseValueMapRenderer does.
 class BaseValueMapRenderer
          A standard implementation of the ValueMapRenderer.
